Name: Working Zombies Steam Edition
About the game: Working zombies in action! Kindhearted zombies who get no love just because they're zombies... They work hard to gain the approval of humans! Play as four unique professions! With over 100 unique stages for you to master! And still more trials await after you've completed them all...?! Flight Attendant Respond to passengers' requests, and help them enjoy a relaxing flight! Make passengers wait and they'll get angry! Nursery School Teacher Respond to the babies' changing moods and make them happy! They'll cry if you don't pay attention to them! Hairstylist Respond to customers' requests, and give them a wonderful new hairstyle! They'll be disappointed if you don't take your job seriously! Plumber Think about how to connect the pipes to get the water flowing! But be careful; there are some pipes the water definitely has to pass through!
